attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern:
My husband and I are adopting from China. Because the wait is so long we are
required to apply twice for the I600A in order to do fingerprints and receive the I-
171H. The cost of adoption will be around $17,000 for us. This is extremely hard
for us to save since we have one daughter from China in daycare.
If you must raise the cost of the I600A, then please at least consider a lower fee
for the second time. Fingerprinting twice for one adoption really adds to the cost of
an already costly process. Money is very tight for us and will be even tighter when
we have two children.
Please help! Keep the fees down!
Thank you for your consideration.
Karen & Bill Nest
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Karen & Bill Nest
